projects.title: Traveler's Guide
projects.description: A comprehensive application designed to assist travellers in planning and managing their trips efficiently. The app generates an itinerary based on users' preferences and provides essential information about destinations, including attractions, accommodations, and local tips, ensuring a seamless travel experience.

projects.title: Snaps
projects.description: A dynamic and user-friendly photo sharing web application that allows users to upload, organize, and share their favorite moments. Users can post photos, tag them with relevant keywords, and leave comments to engage with the community. Designed with a focus on social interaction and visual storytelling, Snaps promotes creativity and connection.

projects.title: InStock
projects.description: A streamlined inventory management system designed to help businesses track inventory levels across multiple warehouses. It provides a centralized platform to monitor stock, manage products, and organize warehouse-specific inventory, ensuring accurate and efficient logistics operations.

projects.title: BandSite
projects.description: A fully functional mockup website for the indie rock band Bees Knees, designed to connect with fans and promote their latest shows. The site features band information, tour dates, ticket purchasing options, and media content. With an aesthetic aligned with the bandâ€™s brand, it enhances their digital presence and audience engagement.

projects.description: A Website to advertise Coffee products

projects.title: Apple Education E-shop
projects.description: Apple e commerce store for educational institution

projects.title: Ligislative Tracking and Record Management System
projects.description: The record management and tracking system was designed to improve file accessibility and maintenance for basic delivery of service; to keep track various legislative records, transactions and documents in aid of efficient legislations; and to modernize sessions.

projects.title: AI aided To-Do App
projects.description: A to-do application based on Microsoft to-do with Gemini AI integration, presented to Microsoft as a hackathon project in the issue of AI adoption of businesses and ethical AI use
